```{r 20150912-HDH-init, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(bibliographica)
library(fennica)
library(sorvi)

# Nice theme
theme_set(theme_bw(20))

# Read data
df <- readRDS("df.Rds")

# Let us focus on years 1400-1828
df <- df %>% filter(publication_year > 1400 & publication_year < 1829)

# Add publication decade
# TODO add already in the original preprocessed data matrix
df$publication_decade <- 10*floor(df$publication_year/10)
```


```{r 20150912-HDH-TurkuVSOthers, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, cache=FALSE, fig.height=4, fig.width=8}

# Add indicator field: Turku or Not Turku
myplace <- "Turku"
df$myplace <- rep(NA, nrow(df))
df$myplace[df$publication_place == myplace] <- myplace
df$myplace[!df$publication_place == myplace & df$country == "Finland"] <- "Finland"
df$myplace[!df$publication_place == myplace & !df$country == "Finland"] <- "Foreign"
df$myplace <- factor(df$myplace, levels = rev(c("Other", "Finland", "Turku")))


# Keep entries with known publication place and paper consumption
# Group by year/decade and Turku/Other
dfs <- df %>%
  #filter(publication_year >= 1600) %>%
  filter(!is.na(publication_place) & !is.na(paper.consumption.km2) & paper.consumption.km2 > -0.01) %>%
  group_by(publication_decade, myplace) %>%
  summarise(titles = n(), paper = sum(paper.consumption.km2))

#p <- ggplot(dfs, aes(x = publication_decade, y = paper, color = myplace)) +
#     geom_point() + geom_smooth() +
#     ylim(0, max(dfs$paper)) +
#     ggtitle("Turku vs. other publication places")

p <- ggplot(dfs, aes(x = publication_decade, y = paper, fill = myplace, order = -as.numeric(myplace))) +
     geom_bar(position = "stack", stat = "identity") +
     ggtitle("Paper consumption") +
     scale_fill_manual(values = c("blue", "black", "darkgreen")) +
     xlab("Publication decade") + ylab("Paper (km2)")
print(p)

p <- ggplot(dfs, aes(x = publication_decade, y = titles, fill = myplace, order = -as.numeric(myplace))) +
     geom_bar(position = "stack", stat = "identity") +
     ggtitle("Title count") +
     scale_fill_manual(values = c("blue", "black", "darkgreen")) +
     xlab("Publication decade") + ylab("Title count (n)")
print(p)
```
